canregtools 0.2.7

    ICD10分类
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    All functions

    ageadjust()
    Calculate the age standardized rate using the direct method.
    calc_age()
    Calculate the actual age between two dates
    check_id()
    Check if the Chinese ID number complies with the GB 11643-1999 standard.
    check_topo()
    Verify if the topographic site codes for ICDO3 comply with the ICDO3 coding rules.
    classify_childhood()
    Classify the Childhood cancer into ICCC3
    classify_icd10()
    Convert ICD10 Codes to Cancer Categories.
    clean_canreg()
    Clean canreg data.
    count_canreg()
    count canreg data.
    count_canreg(<canreg>)
    Count the canreg data.
    count_canreg(<canregs>)
    count the canreg data for class canregs.
    create_age_rate()
    Create age specific rate.
    create_age_rate(<fbswicd>)
    Create age specific rate.
    create_asr()
    Calculate age-standardized rate.
    create_asr(<canreg>)
    Calculate age-standardized rate.
    create_asr(<fbswicd>)
    Calculate age-standardized rate.
    create_quality()
    Create quality index from object of class 'fbswicd'.
    cumrate()
    Calculate the cumulative rate.
    cumrisk()
    Calculate the cumulative risk.
    cutage()
    Cut age into groups.
    draw_bar()
    Draw bar chart.
    draw_barchart()
    Draw group bar chart.
    draw_dumbbell()
    Plot dumbbell chart.
    draw_line()
    Plot line chart
    draw_map()
    Create map.
    draw_pyramid()
    Draw population pyramids.
    draw_pyramid(<fbswicd>)
    Draw pyramids from object of fbswicd.
    estimate_pop()
    Estimating population structure using interpolation method.
    expand_age_pop()
    Expand age groups population.
    expand_lifetable()
    Expand five-year(abridged) life table to one-year(complete) life table.
    icdo3to10()
    Convert ICDO3 codes to ICD10 code.
    lt()
    Calculate life table from mortality rates.
    pyramid()
    Plot population pyramid
    read_areacode()
    Get area codes from National Bureau of Statistics in China.
    read_canreg()
    Read cancer registration data in the format reported to the National Cancer Center.
    read_map()
    Get map of china from dataV.
    reframe_fbswicd()
    Reframe the fbswicds.
    reframe_fbswicd(<canregs>)
    Reframe the object of classs canregs.
    reframe_fbswicd(<fbswicds>)
    Reframe the fbswicds.
    tidy_address()
    Query address code
    tidy_age()
    Tidy age description.
    tidy_occu()
    Tidy occupation codes or description.
    tidy_sex()
    Tidy gender variable
    truncrate()
    Calculate truncated age standardized rate.
    write_area_type()
    Write area type to the user defined dict.
    write_areacode()
    Write Six-digit administrative division code to the user defined dict.
    write_registry()
    Write the registry definition to the user defined dict.

    Developed by Qiong Chen.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.9.
